column5: Antique Shabby chic, our Birdhouse Cottage has a unique style. Sleeps 5 to 7 and has a fully equipped kitchen, linen, flatsreen tv with wifi and cable. The covered balcony is overlooking the water. We are pet friendly. Boats for use with $50 refundable deposit. BBQ pits, smoker, hammocks, tables and chairs. Amazing sunrises over the lake sipping a cup of fresh brewed coffee begin each day with relaxation and serenity!
